trends: There have been no other sightings in Chester
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was outside having a smoke and looking east\southeast or so, 35-50 degrees (guessing here) up and see what i think is a plane in the distance. just a flashing white light - appearing to be fairly high up - i don't see the other blinking lights like you see on a jet. it is moving northest to southwest (left to right) and it is moving fast - the blinks are farther apart than the jets i normally see. it then abruptly changes direction almost back on itself, but not quite, just like a pinball bouncing off a bumper - now going west\southwest to east\northeast (right to left). it abruptly changes directions a few more times then actually follows a circular path which looks like a small loop, makes a few more direction changes, then heads either east or down and vanishes - no more blinking light. i see nothing in that part of the sky but the stars. i've never seen anything move like that. like i said, at first i thouht it was a jet but it was moving too. it was at least a few mile east of me - maybe more. just a blinking white light in the sky. my feelings at the time were - wow that's a fast plane then what the f?! what am i seeing? what did i just see? i looked at my watch as soon as it vanished - stopped flasing - not there anymore. i really have no idea what i saw - just sort of dumbfounded.
Summary: Blinking light moving fast, changes directions a numbr of times, loops, disappears
